item.title: Royal School of Mines bring back the bottle
item.author: George Morgan,
item.description: Following last year’s away loss to CSM, the stage was set for the RSM rugby boys to put in a huge performance. With the glorious sunshine in the hands of RSM, the team looked strong from the off. RSM kicked off well while CSM were being dazzled by the Harlington sun. A knock-on from kick off allowed …
